name: Creepy Deep
description:
Creepy Deep is an endless vertical jumping game, which was inspired by the famous jumper – Doodle Jump. Help the diver to float back to the surface by jumping from platform to platform and dodge from the deep sea creepy monsters. Just tilt your phone or tablet and jump up so high as you can. Collect more gems to grow your score and use power-ups to go up faster and jump higher. Try to survive longer in creepy underwater world playing this infinite jumping arcade. This game template created using Construct 2. 

Buy the game source (CAPX file).
